name: Jump and Puzzle
description:
Demo is currently available which includes a handful of levels and an endless mode that goes on forever. Settings menu currently doesn't work.

Feedback is highly appreciated!

Please follow and add this to your wishlist if you enjoyed it!

Controls:

Jump Player:

  • Left arrow - move left
  • Right arrow - move right
  • Up arrow - jump

Puzzle Player:

  • A - move block left
  • D - move block right
  • Q - rotate block left
  • E - rotate block right
  • S (hold) - fast fall

General:

  • ESC - exit game
  • Arrow/WASD - change selection / level
  • Enter/Space - select option
